election_record.label: Kentucky 1820 Governor

overview.note: "Gen. John Adair has been elected Governor of Kentucky. It is a matter of surprise that a federalist should be the Governor of Kentucky." Delaware Gazette (Wilmington, DE). September 12, 1820.

The Niles' Weekly Register (Baltimore, MD), Argus of Western America, The Illinois Gazette (Shawneetown, IL), Weekly Messenger, Kentucky Reporter (Lexington, KY), Arkansas Gazette, Monitor, Commentor and Louisville Public Advertiser (Louisville, KY) list Joseph Desha with 12419 votes and Anthony Butler with 9567 votes.

sub_unit.name: Adair
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 189 votes and Anthony Butler with 2 votes.
The Olive Branch and Western Union (Danville, KY) lists John Adair with 380 votes, William Logan with 416 votes, Joseph Desha with 181 votes and Anthony Butler with 6 votes.

sub_unit.name: Barren
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 785 votes and Joseph Desha with 215 votes.
The Weekly Messenger (Russellville, KY) lists John Adair with 311 votes, William Logan with 785 votes, Joseph Desha with 212 votes and Anthony Butler with 281 votes.

sub_unit.name: Boone
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists John Adair with 366 votes and Joseph Desha with 84 votes.

sub_unit.name: Bourbon
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 220 votes and Joseph Desha with 1384 votes.

sub_unit.name: Bullitt
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 202 votes, Joseph Desha with 1 vote and Anthony Butler with 37 votes.

sub_unit.name: Butler
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 131 votes.

sub_unit.name: Caldwell
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 95 votes and no votes for Joseph Desha or Anthony Butler.
The Weekly Messenger (Russellville, KY) lists John Adair with 552 votes, William Logan with 75 votes, Joseph Desha with 94 votes and Anthony Butler with 272 votes.

sub_unit.name: Campbell
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists John Adair with 220 votes, William Logan with 261 votes and Anthony Butler with 115 votes.
The Olive Branch and Western Union (Danville, KY) lists John Adair with 202 votes, William Logan with 246 votes, Joseph Desha with 131 votes and Anthony Butler with 114 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 154 votes and Anthony Butler with 328 votes.
The Weekly Messenger (Russellville, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 19 votes and Anthony Butler with 328 votes.

sub_unit.name: Clarke
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 310 votes and Anthony Butler with 118 votes.
The Olive Branch and Western Union (Danville, KY) lists John Adair with 297 votes.

sub_unit.name: Cumberland
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 608 votes and no votes for Joseph Desha or Anthony Butler.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) and Olive Branch (Danville) list John Adair with 42 votes, William Logan with 258 votes, Joseph Desha with 21 votes and Anthony Butler with 56 votes.

sub_unit.name: Fleming
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) and Olive Branch (Danville) list John Adair with 40 votes, William Logan with 455 votes and Joseph Desha with 823 votes.

sub_unit.name: Floyd
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 33 votes.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY), Louisville Public Advertiser (Louisville, KY), Weekly Messenger (Russellville), Kentucky Reporter (Lexington, KY) and The Illinois Gazette (Shawneetown, IL) list Anthony Butler with 373 votes.

sub_unit.name: Grayson
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 94 votes and no votes for Joseph Desha or Anthony Butler.

sub_unit.name: Greenup
sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 81 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Louisville Public Advertiser (Louisville, KY) lists William Logan with 252 votes.
The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 249 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists John Adair with 2 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists no votes for Joseph Desha and Anthony Butler.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists no votes for Joseph Desha and Anthony Butler.

sub_unit.name: Henry
sub_unit.note: The Louisville Public Advertiser (Louisville, KY), Weekly Messenger (Russellville) and Kentucky Reporter (Lexington, KY) lists William Logan with 408 votes.
The Olive Branch and Western Union (Danville, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 75 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists John Adair with 269 votes, William Logan with 27 votes and Joseph Desha with 131 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) and Louisville Public Advertiser (Louisville, KY) list William Logan with 419 votes and Anthony Butler with 650 votes.
The Olive Branch and Western Union (Danville, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 3 votes and Anthony Butler with 626 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists William Logan with 464 votes and Joseph Desha with 1 vote.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 402 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists John Adair with 133 votes, Joseph Desha with 284 votes and Anthony Butler with 172 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 14 votes and Anthony Butler with 124 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) and Olive Branch (Danville) list John Adair with 239 votes, William Logan with 222 votes, Joseph Desha with 590 votes and Anthony Butler with 220 votes.

sub_unit.note: The Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY) lists Joseph Desha with 76 votes and William Logan with 552 votes.
